ISSUE.TITLE: e2e: podm rm empty pod: error in WalkDir
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` podman pod rm empty pod ... Unexpected error: <*fs.PathError | 0xc000879530>: open /sys/fs/cgroup/user.slice/user-3004.slice/user@3004.service/user.slice/libpod-conmon-a71b28bb423c68c150e51edc8e578afeda8d12bd770d4190d21a56fcaaa7e676.scope: no such file or directory { Op: "open", Path: "/sys/fs/cgroup/user.slice/user-3004.slice/user@3004.service/user.slice/libpod-conmon-a71b28bb423c68c150e51edc8e578afeda8d12bd770d4190d21a56fcaaa7e676.scope", Err: <syscall.Errno>0x2, } ``` The code in question is https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/c247b90c4a61a3e4ee38544ea10d5409d805bfbb/test/e2e/pod_rm_test.go#L47-L48 Only one instance that I can find, in [f37 rootless](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/6414147026419712/html/int-podman-fedora-37-rootless-host-boltdb.log.html#t--podman-pod-rm-empty-pod--1)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18268 from edsantiago/bindingtest_fail_early bindings tests: bail out early on image errors

COMMIT.MESSAGE: test: fix race when listing cgroups A cgroup could have been deleted by the time WalkDir is trying to access it. Ignore the error and continue. Closes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/17989 Signed-off-by: Giuseppe Scrivano <gscrivan@redhat.com>
